name: wyvandkeep.zip
items: Wyv and Keep - The Temple of the Lost Idol.sh

attr.title: Wyv and Keep - The Temple of the Lost Idol
attr.desc: Command treasure hunters Wyv and Keep through an ancient Amazonian temple in search of the Lost Idol! Use quick reflexes and teamwork to conquer a gauntlet of 60 fiendish puzzles and deadly traps. Unlock the secrets of the mystical Xu'hutl pygmies and their terrifying overlord, the great Quetzecola.
attr.desc_md: Command treasure hunters Wyv and Keep through an ancient Amazonian temple in search of the Lost Idol! Use quick reflexes and teamwork to conquer a gauntlet of 60 fiendish puzzles and deadly traps. Unlock the secrets of the mystical Xu'hutl pygmies and their terrifying overlord, the great Quetzecola.
attr.inst: Buy the DRM free version of the game (https://www.humblebundle.com/store/wyv-and-keep-the-temple-of-the-lost-idol), download the linux version and copy wyvandkeep-bin into the wyvandkeep port folder.
attr.inst_md: Buy the DRM free version of the game (https://www.humblebundle.com/store/wyv-and-keep-the-temple-of-the-lost-idol), download the linux version and copy wyvandkeep-bin into the wyvandkeep port folder.
